name: Quick Fix (Lawrence Le)
description:
What starts off as a simple errand quickly (d)evolves into a tale of life, love, and loss fake currencies, goose sleuths, and caffeine abuse. Rub elbows with the oddball inhabitants of Yorkel and outsmart its cruel, coffee-drinking despot to finally secure some decent internet service.

How to Play:

Click anywhere or press SPACE to advanced dialogue. During inspection segments, move mouse to locate interactable objects and click to select.

Known Bugs: 

  • Occasionally, portraits will remain greyed out even while that character is speaking
  • Spam clicking too quickly may cause portraits to disappear for several lines of dialogue

Facts:

  • ~45 minutes in length 
  • 7500+ words
  • 2.5 months of development
